game.title: The Lost Amulet
game.objective: Find the lost amulet of the ancient king.
game.description: The amulet was lost many years ago in a battle between the ancient king and a powerful sorcerer. It is said that the amulet contains great power, and whoever possesses it will be granted untold wealth and power.

task.@objective: Travel to the ancient ruins of the king's palace
task.description: The ruins are located deep in the forest, and are said to be haunted by the ghosts of the ancient king and his soldiers.

task.@objective: Find the secret entrance to the king's tomb
task.description: The entrance to the tomb is hidden somewhere within the ruins. It is said to be guarded by a powerful creature.

task.@objective: Defeat the creature guarding the tomb
task.description: The creature is a powerful monster that will stop at nothing to protect the tomb.
The amulet is located somewhere within the tomb.
